name: Number Typer
description:
Number Typer is a small game made in the Python programming language that requires only typing! To play you type, to exit you type, you name it, this game consists of only typing, typing, & typing! Of course,  not the I'm-writing-a-super-long-boring-document type of typing, but the fun type of typing!

(Btw, I've said the word "type" 9 times in this small paragraph. That's a lot of typing!)

Huge thanks to Jason R. Briggs, since he wrote the book that got me interested in Python.
